column5: Well folks, that long awaited day is fast approaching! Been pining for a while now and finally the big day is near! My family and I are heading to Golden Eagle for a weeks stay and I am very much looking forward to it! My wife, on the other hand is very concerned about the8-9 hour drive and how our 4 and 6 year olds are gonna cope. Well, we have tow portable DVD players, I'm about to mount a couple of rubber mallets to the ceiling in the Jimmy and will simply swipe the mallets for direct and non-marking back seat calmness! I won't be around here until Aug. 18th, so play nice together folks and any and all who have contacted me re resumes etc... I'll be getting back to you upon my return! Yah, I'll take pics and if I'm remotely lucky, may even catch a fish or two! Have a great week all! HH
Good luck and have lots of fun!!  Give the kids some gravol, maybe they'll sleep for a nice chunk of the drive....LOL.
Have a safe and happy journey HH
Have fun and good luck with the kids and the wife.  The drive should be an interesting one, and probably more challenging than catching a fish or two.  FLEX

Have a great trip bud, we're headed north on Saturday for a week as well. Weather looks dicey at the moment, but no matter.  My place is about an hour N/E of New Liskeard. Too bad you won't be a bit closer, a day trip and a few cold ones would be fun  .

Good luck HH!  Even if the fishing is not so good (I'm sure it will be), you'll have a blast.  And if the heavens open up and the snow comes down a little early, at least you'll have the portable DVD player...   And Solopaddler, I'm sure you'll have great time as well.  I know this, because I'm from New Liskeard!  cheers guys! HD
Good luck hh... hopefully we can bump into each other...
Have a great time at Elk Lake hope the black flies and squitters have died down by now.
Have a super time Joe, we'll miss you  Drive safe and bring lots of DVD's.  Joey

Elk lake or bust?  that sounds pretty familiar. lol  best of luck to you and your family, hope ya have a great time up there.  tell kerrie and della i said hi, and look out for hunter the dog he is huge but a big teddy bear. dont forget to ask about the boats on the backlakes and you will catch a ton.  orange, orange, orange lol  jason
Thanks folks! Just about got the truck loaded, I can't believe I'm bringing 11 fishing rods! I think I have a problem! Hmmmm... did I pack my orange harnesses... HH
Have a great vacation don't forget to make them tasty vegy meat thingys
